content.prompt: Which of the following claims does the author make about the Portuguese ruling dynasty?

choices.label: It was hindered by conflicting political jurisdictions.
It consolidated power and overcame feudal divisions.
It was an appendage of the Habsburg Empire.
It was in conflict with the Spanish.

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Identify and describe a claim and/or argument in a text-based or non-text-based source.
